page.title: 19Swimming in Skegness
page.content: We were very pleased when our school swimming team won the East Coast Gala recently. Most of the members of the team learned to swim in our Town pool but they were unable to do much practising because the pool only opens in the summer as it is an open air pool. There has been a lot of discussion about providing an indoor pool for the use of the residents in the winter but as yet nothing has been done by the local council. Some town's people have formed an indoor swimming pool association but have not succeeded in their aim yet. Several of the hotels have small pools but it seems that we will have to wait for some time before the people who live by the sea can learn to swim,in safety, at any time of the year!
